name: Wave & Сurve
description:
With «Wave & Curve» you can easily create a variety of waves and interesting patterns!

Four modes are supported*: 
- with two control points (cubic curve); 
- with one control point (quadratic curve).
- Arc curve.
- Square curve.

You can choose the direction of the waves : Top and Bottom, Top, Bottom.

Locks near the parameters (appear on hover) allow you to lock them for the Random.

* This only matters at the time of generation, Figma converts all curves to cubic.
